Beginning.description: Structured, step-by-step classes for students new to yoga or returning after a break. Focus on foundations, precision, alignment, and timing.
Beginning.notes: Not suitable for chronic conditions or major injuries. Consider Yoga Therapy classes if needed.

General.description: For students with at least one year of experience. Refine practice and work with inversions (Full Arm Balance, Elbow Balance, Headstand, Shoulder Stand).

Experienced.description: For students familiar with inversions and looking to deepen their practice. Focus on complex poses, longer holds, alignment, and integration.

focus_areas: Backbends – energizing and opening the front body
Dynamic – active movement for strength and coordination

Seniors.description: Classes for older students to enhance mobility, stability, strength, and overall wellness.
Seniors.notes: Suitable for new and experienced students.

Dynamic.description: Fast-moving classes to build strength, endurance, and flexibility. Includes jumps and momentum-based movement.
Dynamic.notes: For General level and above. Not suitable for beginners or injuries.

Early Rise.description: 45-minute dynamic class to energize the body and mind.
Early Rise.notes: For General level and above. Not for beginners.

Yoga Therapy – Personal.description: One-on-one sessions tailored for students with injuries, medical conditions, or specific individual needs.

Yoga Therapy – Group.description: Structured group classes using props and specialised programs to support students with common issues. Each student follows the program at their own level.

Knees & Hips.description: Gentle, supported class using props for knee and hip issues.

Neck & Back.description: Gentle, supported class targeting upper and lower spine issues.

Teacher Training Program.description: 3-year structured program in Iyengar Yoga methodology (300 hours).
details: Flexible pace: attend one year, take a break, restart, or complete just one year.
Costs: $2,500 per year, with deposits and instalments required.

Single Begin Class.details: Single beginner class for new students.

2-Week Unlimited Pass.details: Unlimited classes for two weeks. For new students with prior yoga experience.

10 Class Pack.details: Valid for in-studio classes except Yoga Therapy – Personal, workshops, and online.

Casual.details: Valid for in-studio classes except Yoga Therapy – Personal, workshops, and online.

Casual Online.details: Live online classes + Content Library access. Cannot be used in-studio.
